data.message: Wow. Exciting. Neha, I ask you, Recently I messaged you. Thank you so much for response. I like facebook. I want to verify my profile. Recently i was messaged you for about getting verified. Please help me....

replies.message: Hi Prothush. You can learn more about the process for verifying Pages here: http://bit.ly/2uRUymz. Please keep in mind that not all Pages are currently eligible for verification. Thanks! -Caitlin

Thank you so much for response. When I visit this site  then displayed show, "The feature isn't available everyone Right now."
Please solve this problem.
Thank you Caitlin Madam.
